collectible.title: Custom Churros Panties
collectible.subtitle: A lewd present from an aristocratic girl.
collectible.text: "Um... Th-these are f-for you... Y-You beat me, so, um, I think y-you'd like to keep these... It's OK... I, um, have a few pair already... J-Just don't do anything t-too, um... lewd..."
